short_summary: To provide HR consultants who can provide subject-matter expertise and support related to the project of Chief Digital Officer Sector
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada requires one Senior HR Consultant and one Intermediate HR Consultant to assist CDOS with their HR capacity needs.
full_summary:
## **Notice of Proposed Procurement: Senior and Intermediate HR Consultants** **Reference Number:** cb-734-65643950
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-17
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-03T14:00:00 ### **Project Overview** Pêches et Océans (DFO) Canada is seeking a Senior HR Consultant and an Intermediate HR Consultant to provide subject-matter expertise and support. The Chief Digital Officer Sector (SDPN) is conducting several competitions throughout the year and is currently reviewing existing work descriptions and human resource planning. ### **Procurement Details** * **Trade Agreements:** The project is open to regulated suppliers who conform to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP) and other Trade Agreements listed under Tender Details. * **Security Level:** Secret. * **Estimated Level of Effort:** 190 days. * **Contract Period:** From the contract award date to June 30, 2025, with three (3) additional one (1) year options. ### **Eligibility Framework** The requirement is open only to those regulated suppliers under Goods and Services (E60ZT-18TSPS) who qualify for the Tier 1 category and have the stated consultant category, security level, region, level of expertise. ### **Services Required** The services required are: * Human Resources Consulting Services (including Human Resources Services). * Assist the Chief Digital Officer Sector with their HR capacity needs. ### **Invited Suppliers** The following suppliers are invited to submit a proposal: 1. 7792395 Canada Inc. 2. Acosys Consulting Services Inc. 3. Adirondack Information Management Inc. 4. ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp. 5. Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc. ... (and so on until 33) ### **Additional Details** For more information, including the method of supply, selection criteria, and evaluation procedures, please visit [Insert link to Notice of Proposed Procurement]. ### **Communication and Contact** For any questions or concerns, please contact Simon Cousineau, Contracting Authority, at [simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto: simon.cousineau@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or (343) 548-1568. Note: The estimated total of effort and duration are approximate and may vary depending on the selected supplier. Suppliers are encouraged to participate,
